DataElement.preferredDefinition: A distinctive identification code assigned by the manufacturer or distributor to a specific quantity of manufactured fixative within a batch.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A compound that preserves tissues and cells for microscopic study._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
